column5: Relax in Buda away from the noise and bustle of Downtown Austin, but close enough to visit. Buda is a short drive from Downtown Austin, San Marcos, and wineries and hiking in the hill country (Fredericksburg, Dripping Springs, Driftwood and Wimberly). Buda has a charming old town main street with restaurants, bars and shopping.  Special Events in Buda area: 6/30: Two Wheel Brewing Co. Grand Opening 7/4: festival, parade, fireworks, music Live music every weekend at local bars!
